text:
"Finnigan Fox" is an upcoming side-scrolling platformer video game in development for the Intellivision Amico. It is a spin-off of the 2018 video game "Fox N Forests", which was released on Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch.
Development.
In March 2019, Bonus Level Entertainment announced that the studio was working on a new game because "Fox N Forests" was successful. Tommy Tallarico, the CEO of Intellivision Entertainment, announced the game as "Finnigan Fox" on August 5, 2020 in a special event about the Intellivision Amico that was shown live.
